result.eng: We are broadcasting live from Galway.
result.ga: Tá muid ag craoladh beo ó Ghaillimh
result.orig: Tá muid ag craoladh beo ó Ghaillimh
result.html: Tá muid ag craoladh beo ó GhaillimhWe are broadcasting live from Galway.
result.ponchtml: Tá muid ag craolaḋ beo ó ĠailliṁWe are broadcasting live from Galway.

result.html: An clár beo é sinIs that a live programme?
result.ponchtml: An clár beo é sinIs that a live programme?

result.html: Má bhíonn sé fós beoIf he's still alive.
result.ponchtml: Má ḃíonn sé fós beoIf he's still alive.

result.html: Tá mé fós beoI am still alive.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé fós beoI am still alive.

result.eng: The ten of them are still alive, thank God.
result.ga: Tá an deichniúr acu fós beo buíochas le Dia
result.orig: Tá an deichniúr acu fós beo buíochas le Dia
result.html: Tá an deichniúr acu fós beo buíochas le DiaThe ten of them are still alive, thank God.
result.ponchtml: Tá an deiċniúr acu fós beo buíoċas le DiaThe ten of them are still alive, thank God.

result.eng: I looked closely to see if anything was moving, anything at all. Am I the only living creature here?
result.ga: D'fhéach mé go grinn ag iarraidh cor a fheiceáil cor beag ar bith An mise an t-aon neach beo anseo
result.orig: D'fhéach mé go grinn ag iarraidh cor a fheiceáil cor beag ar bith An mise an t-aon neach beo anseo
result.html: D'fhéach mé go grinn ag iarraidh cor a fheiceáil cor beag ar bith An mise an t-aon neach beo anseoI looked closely to see if anything was moving, anything at all. Am I the only living creature here?
result.ponchtml: D'ḟéaċ mé go grinn ag iarraiḋ cor a ḟeiceáil cor beag ar biṫ An mise an t-aon neaċ beo anseoI looked closely to see if anything was moving, anything at all. Am I the only living creature here?

result.eng: Your thumb is bleeding. Put a plaster on it, for God's sake!
result.ga: Tá d'ordóg ag cur fola Cuir greimlín uirthi go beo
result.orig: Tá d'ordóg ag cur fola Cuir greimlín uirthi go beo
result.html: Tá d'ordóg ag cur fola Cuir greimlín uirthi go beoYour thumb is bleeding. Put a plaster on it, for God's sake!
result.ponchtml: Tá d'ordóg ag cur fola Cuir greimlín uirṫi go beoYour thumb is bleeding. Put a plaster on it, for God's sake!

result.eng: Everybody who was alive in 1963 says they remember exactly the point in time when they heard of President John F. Kennedy's assassination.
result.ga: Deir gach éinne a bhí beo i 1963 gur cuimhin leo go cruinn ala an ama ar chuala siad faoi dhúnmharú an Uachtaráin John F Kennedy
result.orig: Deir gach éinne a bhí beo i 1963 gur cuimhin leo go cruinn ala an ama ar chuala siad faoi dhúnmharú an Uachtaráin John F Kennedy
result.html: Deir gach éinne a bhí beo i 1963 gur cuimhin leo go cruinn ala an ama ar chuala siad faoi dhúnmharú an Uachtaráin John F KennedyEverybody who was alive in 1963 says they remember exactly the point in time when they heard of President John F. Kennedy's assassination.
result.ponchtml: Deir gaċ éinne a ḃí beo i 1963 gur cuiṁin leo go cruinn ala an ama ar ċuala siad faoi ḋúnṁarú an Uaċtaráin John F KennedyEverybody who was alive in 1963 says they remember exactly the point in time when they heard of President John F. Kennedy's assassination.

result.eng: While I was watching those live pictures [on TV], one thing was bothering me:...
result.ga: Agus mé ag breathnú ar na pictiúirí beo seo bhí rud amháin ag déanamh scime dom
result.orig: Agus mé ag breathnú ar na pictiúirí beo seo bhí rud amháin ag déanamh scime dom
result.html: Agus mé ag breathnú ar na pictiúirí beo seo bhí rud amháin ag déanamh scime domWhile I was watching those live pictures [on TV], one thing was bothering me:...
result.ponchtml: Agus mé ag breaṫnú ar na pictiúirí beo seo ḃí rud aṁáin ag déanaṁ scime domWhile I was watching those live pictures [on TV], one thing was bothering me:...

result.eng: I have no idea what happened.
result.ga: Níl a fhios agam beo cad a tharla
result.orig: Níl a fhios agam beo cad a tharla
result.html: Níl a fhios agam beo cad a tharlaI have no idea what happened.
result.ponchtml: Níl a ḟios agam beo cad a ṫarlaI have no idea what happened.
